verses.verse: Now these are the kings<WH4428> of the land,<WH776> whom the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> struck,<WH5221> and possessed<WH3423> their land<WH776> beyond<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383> toward the sunrise,<WH8121> <WH4217> from the valley<WH5158> of the Arnon<WH769> to Mount<WH2022> Hermon,<WH2768> and all the Arabah<WH6160> eastward:<WH4217>

Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> who lived<WH3427> in Heshbon,<WH2809> and ruled<WH4910> from Aroer,<WH6177> which is on the edge<WH8193> of the valley<WH5158> of the Arnon,<WH769> and the middle<WH8432> of the valley,<WH5158> and half<WH2677> Gilead,<WH1568> even to the river<WH5158> Jabbok,<WH2999> the border<WH1366> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon;<WH5983>

and the Arabah<WH6160> to the sea<WH3220> of Chinneroth,<WH3672> eastward,<WH4217> and to the sea<WH3220> of the Arabah,<WH6160> even the Salt<WH4417> Sea,<WH3220> eastward,<WH4217> the way<WH1870> to Beth Jeshimoth;<WH1020> and on the south,<WH8486> under the slopes of Pisgah:<WH798>
and the border<WH1366> of Og<WH5747> king<WH4428> of Bashan,<WH1316> of the remnant<WH3499> of the Rephaim,<WH7497> who lived<WH3427> at Ashtaroth<WH6252> and at Edrei,<WH154>

and ruled<WH4910> in Mount<WH2022> Hermon,<WH2768> and in Salecah,<WH5548> and in all Bashan,<WH1316> to the border<WH1366> of the Geshurites<WH1651> and the Maacathites,<WH4602> and half<WH2677> Gilead,<WH1568> the border<WH1366> of Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of Heshbon.<WH2809>

Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of Yahweh<WH3068> and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> struck<WH5221> them.<WH4872> Moses the servant<WH5650> of Yahweh<WH3068> gave<WH5414> it for a possession<WH3425> to the Reubenites,<WH7206> and the Gadites,<WH1425> and the half-tribe<WH2677> <WH7626> of Manasseh.<WH4519>

These are the kings<WH4428> of the land<WH776> whom Joshua<WH3091> and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> struck<WH5221> beyond<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383> westward,<WH3220> from Baal Gad<WH1171> in the valley<WH1237> of Lebanon<WH3844> even to Mount<WH2022> Halak,<WH2510> that goes up<WH5927> to Seir.<WH8165> Joshua<WH3091> gave<WH5414> it to the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478> for a possession<WH3425> according to their divisions;<WH4256>

in the hill country,<WH2022> and in the lowland,<WH8219> and in the Arabah,<WH6160> and in the slopes,<WH794> and in the wilderness,<WH4057> and in the South;<WH5045> the Hittite,<WH2850> the Amorite,<WH567> and the Canaanite,<WH3669> the Perizzite,<WH6522> the Hivite,<WH2340> and the Jebusite:<WH2983>
the king<WH4428> of Jericho,<WH3405> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Ai,<WH5857> which is beside<WH6654> Bethel,<WH1008> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Hebron,<WH2275> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Jarmuth,<WH3412> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Lachish,<WH3923> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Eglon,<WH5700> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Gezer,<WH1507> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Debir,<WH1688> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Geder,<WH1445> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Hormah,<WH2767> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Arad,<WH6166> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Libnah,<WH3841> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Adullam,<WH5725> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Makkedah,<WH4719> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Bethel,<WH1008> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Tappuah,<WH8599> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Hepher,<WH2660> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Aphek,<WH663> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Lassharon,<WH8289> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Madon,<WH4068> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Hazor,<WH2674> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Shimron Meron,<WH8112> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Achshaph,<WH407> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Taanach,<WH8590> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Megiddo,<WH4023> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Kedesh,<WH6943> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Jokneam<WH3362> in Carmel,<WH3760> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Dor<WH1756> in the height<WH5299> of Dor,<WH1756> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Goiim<WH1471> in Gilgal,<WH1537> one;<WH259>
the king<WH4428> of Tirzah,<WH8656> one:<WH259> all the kings<WH4428> <WH259> thirty-one.<WH7970>
